short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables Fextralife VIP-only map features without having to pay for it

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enables features blocked behind the VIP paywall for the Interactive Map of Elden Ring, Hogwarts Legacy and GOW: Ragnarok.

Features:
- Option to use fullscreen by clicking the expand screen icon
- Progress Tracker: Click on any item and "mark as complete" to save your progress locally
- Progress Reset
- Multiple Character Slots
